images.alt_text: AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing its vibrant beaches and cultural landmarks.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and exotic, showcasing beaches and cultural landmarks
assetRequirements.content_context: A stunning beach scene in Thailand during autumn, highlighting the warm weather and lush landscapes.

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the beauty of Thailand's cultural sites
assetRequirements.visual_style: rich colors and intricate details of temples
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of famous temples in Thailand, capturing the essence of culture and history.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя осенний Тайланд: экзотика ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing its vibrant beaches and cultural landmarks.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
